option.frozenlib.component.title: FrozenLib Options
tooltip.frozenlib.use_wind_on_non_frozen:
When disabled, the client won't use wind on servers that
don't have FrozenLib installed.
When enabled, the client will generate a random seed to use
for wind on servers that don't have FrozenLib installed.
tooltip.frozenlib.save_item_cooldowns:
Whether or not item cooldowns will save instead of being
cleared upon switching dimensions or rejoining a world.
